{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Dynex |model=DX-NRUTER |revision=v1 |upc=600603119040 |ean= |asin=B0027Z4SZO |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/02/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTB-239GN |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=K7SDXNRUTER |ic_id=3623A-DXNRUTER |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4703;BCM4703KFBG, CS0839 P12, 893847 B1; |cpu1_cspeed=264 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DBTI-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Qimonda |ram1_model=HYB25DC256160CE-5 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4322;BCM4322LKFBG, TG0836 P11, 891093 01; |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG, RG0838 P11, 893454 1A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;;2; |flags=boot log |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.37; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Dynex |default_ssid_regex=^Dynex$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:1C:DF |oui_eth=00:1C:DF }} [http://www.dynexproducts.com/products/computer-accessories/DX-NRUTER.html?supportTab=open Product page]
[http://www.dynexproducts.com/cms/documents/DX-NRUTER_08-1501_ENGLISH_WEB.pdf User manual] OEM Gemtek WRTB-239GN (Gemtek WRTB-239GN_V01) "ENG-X10-2001R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{TechInfoDepot|Dynex_DX-NRUTER}} [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=46016 On the DD-WRT forums] (high-res internal images and label shot) Per the manual, ''the default network name of your router is "Dynex" followed by six digits that are unique to your router''. The default SSID in actuality appears to be just '''Dynex''' (at least when reset via the reset button and the web configuration interface). {{WiFiCert|WFA6672|09/08/2008}} ==Images== File:Dynex DX-NRUTER.jpg|Dynex's shot [[Has images::external| ]] File:Dynex DX-NRUTER component closeup DDWF.jpg|component closeup File:Dynex DX-NRUTER board top DDWF.jpg|board top [[Has images::internal| ]] File:Dynex DX-NRUTER angled.jpg|angled File:Dynex DX-NRUTER top.jpg|top File:Dynex DX-NRUTER bottom.jpg|bottom File:Dynex DX-NRUTER label.jpg|label File:Dynex DX-NRUTER back.jpg|back File:Dynex DX-NRUTER power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] File:Dynex DX-NRUTER board top in case.jpg|board top, in case File:Dynex DX-NRUTER board top.jpg|board top File:Dynex DX-NRUTER BCM4703.jpg|BCM4703 File:Dynex DX-NRUTER Flash.jpg|Flash File:Dynex DX-NRUTER RAM.jpg|RAM File:Dynex DX-NRUTER BCM4322.jpg|BCM4322 File:Dynex DX-NRUTER RF.jpg|RF File:Dynex DX-NRUTER BCM5325E.jpg|BCM5325E Switch File:Dynex DX-NRUTER Gemtek PN.jpg|Gemtek P/N File:Dynex DX-NRUTER J6.jpg|J6 File:Dynex DX-NRUTER J21.jpg|J21 File:Dynex DX-NRUTER board bot.jpg|board bottom ==Serial== ===Pinout=== Pinout appears to be the same as the [[Belkin F5D8235-4 v1]] (another Gemtek device). That pinout is below. 
    J6
      (   )
(GND) (RxD)
(GND) (   ) --> Right side of board
(VCC) (   )
(VCC) [TxD]
